condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national, local and individual capacities and responses for child protection in humanitarian situations.

description.narrative: Significant progress reached to implement Republic Act 10821. All 17 regions trained on this law and issued resolution to organise their Regional Child Protection Working Group. Coordination with government for grave violations sustained. Verification and response to grave violations improved at 80%. Children disengaged from MILF benefit from case management | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/01/2019
